transArray.content: This hotel was recommended by a colleague when I came to Beijing on business. The location is very good. Opposite the hotel is Line 6. It is very convenient to travel. The service at the front desk of the hotel is also very good. I will come to this hotel next time I come to Beijing. Great!

Hello dear guests! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and sharing your stay experience with us. As you said, the hotel is located in the Badili Automobile Park on the West 4th Ring Road, only a five-minute walk from Haidian 5th Road Ju Station on Metro Line 6. , the surrounding transportation network extends in all directions. It is only 3 kilometers away from 301 Hospital! Free parking is provided on site! It is very convenient for business trips, tourism and medical treatment! Even more happy to see your affirmative recognition. When you check in next time, if you have any questions about the room, you can contact our front desk partners at any time. We are at your side 24 hours a day. We look forward to your visit again and wish you a happy life!
